website_summaries.verdict: A good purchase to consider when you want better sound coming from a small speaker.
pros: Uses a unique speaker design that maximizes sound production without taking up too much room on the board
Good overall sound quality and frequency distribution
cons: Comes as a single speaker only

customer_reviews.title: A year in service and still running great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these March last year. They have been on the roll cage of my jeep for a year now and are still working great. I'm driving them with a 45 watt/channel marine head unit, no external amp. They sound good. I was caught in a heavy downpour with the top off. Water was dripping off the radio and everything was soaked and through it all, these speakers kept on keeping on. The housing is a heavy plastic. Speakers can be replaced reusing the pods if that one day becomes necessary. The clamp is aluminum and it bites in good. They don't vibrate or move around.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylord

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I installed a pair on my wakeboard tower and am really impressed with the quality and value. The sound is is a great improvement compared to my factory speakers, but I will need to add an amp to really enjoy the capabilities of these 600w speakers. Wiring is easy, and the billet aluminum mounting brackets are very secure. The wireless remote is needed to select and synchronize LED lighting effects, but once set up the light show begins automatically whenever the speakers are powered on.
customer_reviews.author: PoolMan

customer_reviews.title: Best Option For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers. They sound great and are doing fine in salt water spray. You'll need a big amp to properly power them but they sound great and are good quality. With two speakers mounted on wakeboard tower, we can comfortably hear music 65' behind boat when riding wakeboard. It's confusing that they say system, as there is only one speaker per purchase, but still a great value. I'm sure the name brand wake speakers are great, but for the money, you really cant beat these things! And the newest model with the big silver attachment clamp fits a 2.5" Monster tower with no problem. Edit: 1.5 years after purchase with no issues whatsoever, still sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: OK for the price. Hard to find outdoor rugged speakers that sound good and you don't spend an arm and a a leg for. These are typical 6x9 sound, crisp highs and good mid but a bit lacking on the bass. For use on a boat (or in my case, a jeep) they work. They have 2 tweeters which is not necessary, just a sales gimmick.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this to my rzr, so far so good. It out lasted my other speakers that only made it 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Attila C

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love them and you’ll love them to I installed them on my pontoon boat they look and work great! I am currently powering them off 1000 want to channel him and they sound awesome. Great sound And I am very picky when it comes to stereo equipment
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Bad tweeters, plan on new speakers if you like loud
customer_reviews.text: Good mount, good housing, good mid speaker, bad tweeters. They would distort around 100 watts, then around 200 after a few minutes at tat level the tweeters burned out, didn't put up a fight like no smoke, no noises, I believe they are very light duty. Everything else is good but no where near rated watts, this is more like 100rms 200 peak
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Mounted on my Jeep roll cage
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker it was worth it. I installed it in a jeep on the roll bars. The only complaint I have is that when I turned the clamp to fit the roll bar I couldn't tighten it back up, so now I get a swivel in the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Got these speakers and it’s blown right of the box, buzzing and sounds horrible. There is a no return policy so now I’m just stuck with broken speakers and no return or refund. Better hope you get a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Seth c.

customer_reviews.title: I like the look and sound of them and now I ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a couple of months now and they do what I needed. I like the look and sound of them and now I can hear the radio with the top off my jeep. These and a new amp was all I needed to add.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Wade

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair for my maverick x3, it was not easy to mount because space is very limited, had to fabricate a bracket to mount them from the roof rack, the sound is amazing, the LED stopped working after the first ride,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend this much on speakers when I normally just build my own. But these sound good, are loud and haven’t fallen apart yet
customer_reviews.author: matthew noble

customer_reviews.title: So disgusted.. Worked awesome the 31 days they worked
customer_reviews.text: LOL wow 1 day after AMAZON return window closed.. Lights on 1 unit have failed.. So disgusted.. Worked awesome the 31 days they worked.. They sound excellent, look great, and securely mount.. Very pleased overall, except NOW MY LIGHTS look light crap since one does not work..
customer_reviews.author: Manfred K. Dulle

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these they arrived incomplete with a 3rd party remote for the lights that does not work.Contacted Boss Audio and they have told me because i am in the UK they will not help.
customer_reviews.author: little mixer 17

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers, Loud Clean and Clear Music
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are LOUD!! I got them so i can hear my music while going down the highway in my Jeep and they work! They have much more bass then what i thought they would have. They sound really great when they are cranked up. I can actually turn them up loud enough to the point where my other aftermarket speakers sound like poo while these speakers still clear. The enclosure is a lot bigger then i thought but it still fits in the Jeep so i'm not complaining. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these speakers in April and installed them in July. We literally used them once and they sounded horrible and fuzzy. To late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Barnes

customer_reviews.title: These speakers look amazing but that is about it
customer_reviews.text: These speakers look amazing but that is about it. Hooked these up on the tower of my boat anticipating entertaining guests on the boat over the 4th of July weekend. They sounded great for about twenty minutes but then developed a loud crackling noise that continued to get worse. Ended up pulling the speakers out of the housing and installing different speakers so I could have tunes on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D Lingenfelter

customer_reviews.title: ... picky when it comes to audio but they sound great. Love them
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky when it comes to audio but they sound great. Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B.

customer_reviews.title: I have them installed on my boat tee top and work fantastic. Surpassed my expectation
customer_reviews.text: outstanding sound and very loud. I have them installed on my boat tee top and work fantastic. Surpassed my expectation. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: SilverNBlueBleeder

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Put them on my T-Tops on my fishing boat. They are very nice, well built, great sound

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: these are great so far but check your specs, wayyyyyy bigger than i expected.

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my can am side by side. Loud as hell! Really nice speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Callahan

customer_reviews.title: They sound good though.
customer_reviews.text: Won't hold the claimed power, didn't come with power wire to turn lights on. Had to call boss and argue to get it since it's a special plug. Then had to do it again since they sent 1 plug for 2 speakers. They sound good though.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: One whole season of wake boarding and they are still performing great. Just ordered 2 more for the tower, it's going to sound sick!

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ok I guess for the price! I had to silicone all the high's in cause they all fell out and were hanging

customer_reviews.title: These are great sounding boat tower speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these on a boat tower, and they rock. Very loud and clear. Highly recommend for anyone. You will like them.

customer_reviews.title: Loud, clear and solid speakers. Put them on ...
customer_reviews.text: Loud, clear and solid speakers. Put them on the back of my Teryx4 with a 1000 wat Pyle Bluetooth amp and it is now a party on wheels.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Heavy. Lights are nice but not super bright Sound great,clear and loud without amp.

customer_reviews.title: extremely loud and can here very clear behind boat.
customer_reviews.text: extremely loud and can here very clear behind boat. I have two hooked to a 600 watt two channel amp

customer_reviews.title: You get better than what you pay for on these
customer_reviews.text: You get better than what you pay for on these. Not much better, but in comparison the are much cheaper.

customer_reviews.title: Redster
customer_reviews.text: Sound great for the price. Easy to install. Definitely made a difference in the boat and made our lake experience more fun.

customer_reviews.text: well made speakers. time will tell if they can hold up but don't see any reason why they won't.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Well built, solid mounting hardware. Clamped onto the roll bar of my jeep with no problem. Look & sound great !

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: after about a year or so of use both speakers blew and now rattle...

customer_reviews.text: Nice loud speakers bigger than I thought but made them work Only bad is it took almost 3 weeks to receive them

customer_reviews.text: They are junk. Over rated on wattage. Don't buy them.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker for the price. I have 3 of them hangging from my wakeboard tower and they sound great. The bracket is easly moved to allow different mounting locations.

customer_reviews.title: No returns, be aware.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quaility - no returns. I blew it with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound sound is unbeatable but there kinda big other than that pretty awesome

customer_reviews.title: Nice Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a while. I bought based upon price but thrash them in my jeep. They have taken the abuse nicely and still sound good.
customer_reviews.author: greg peters

customer_reviews.title: if you got the money JLaudio among others is a better choice
customer_reviews.text: They are ok for the money if you are the type of person that likes quality music then this is not for you but for the money my client was aware what he was getting , if you got the money JLaudio among others is a better choice
customer_reviews.author: Administrator

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mounted speakers and they sound great with the Boss MR800 amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these and installed on our ATV. I was hesitant about the Boss brand but I read the other reviews and thought I'd give them a try. These were a lot cheaper than most of the other waketower speakers I found. They sound awesome! I was amazed. I have a Sony marine Bluetooth radio connected to them. They do a great job.
customer_reviews.author: AuntRobo

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. I have cranked music the whole first season on the lake with these on the tower of my malibu and havent had any issues. Easy to wire and very loud. Always make an impression at party cover when I roll in. I plan to get many years use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: When these came I was a little shocked...as the description says 6x9, which I assumed was the outer measurement....however, this speaker is pretty big....in fact it measured about 9x11x11....was much larger than what we'd hoped for, (we mounted this under our airboat seat, but we made it work by removing the top silver bracket that's meant to attach to a waketower....overall we're happy with the purchase due to the great sound and it's definitley a quality speaker that's going to hold up for many years to come, without a doubt, we were just wanting something a little smaller to take up less space....but all in all, happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lemi

customer_reviews.title: I paired these with a Boss MR800 amp and they sound awesome! The bass and clarity of the highs and ...
customer_reviews.text: Mounted these on my RZR 570 cage, it required a little modification to make it fit tight, but No big deal it was expected. I paired these with a Boss MR800 amp and they sound awesome! The bass and clarity of the highs and mids were Satisfying. I had high hopes for these speakers and I am not disappointed what so ever. 7/7/15 Update: Speakers are still doing awesome! They have been pressure washed and covered in mud and dust many times. Still impressed, Although the amp i paired them with is going to get replaced for poor efficiency. Takes wayy to much power cuts out. Going to try a MTX amp and see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: Matt F.

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: Look awsome on my can am maverick.. sound pretty good... i can hear them over the loud engine riding at 40-50 mph. Also the speakers swivel on the clamp so i can spin them around while hanging out at the local mud hole!!
customer_reviews.author: James Williams

customer_reviews.title: They sounded good for half a day and then the large speaker ...
customer_reviews.text: I had these professionally installed with a 400 watt Pioneer Amp. They sounded good for half a day and then the large speaker blew and sounds horrible now. Completely dissatisfied with my purchase. I would recommend a better quality brand.
customer_reviews.author: AB grub

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE, THIS IS FOR ONE SPEAKER ONLY, NOT A PAIR...
customer_reviews.text: Such a waste of time, make sure you order 2 if you need a pair, Now I gotta wait 3 more days for another, more money wasted...
customer_reviews.author: The Ol' Captain

customer_reviews.title: good product but picture misleading to quantity
customer_reviews.text: Good tough design be aware that this product only comes with one speaker and clamp is designed for a.big piping was a bit too big for my boat or utv but nothing a.little modifications couldn't fix
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had two other sets of tower speakers for my Mastercraft wakeboard boat. Unfortunately both sets have been stolen so I am forced to replace the speakers for the third time. These speakers are very impressive for the price. The build quality is solid and the output from the speaker is fairly loud. Considering the previous speakers cost around $900 per set, these speakers sound 80% as good for a fraction of the price. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: brian9123

customer_reviews.title: Jeeping with boss
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. I install them in my jeep on the roll cage . Also put a pair on our cook trailer at work
customer_reviews.author: donnie wiess

customer_reviews.title: the bracket to attached the speaker
customer_reviews.text: Sound it's ok, the bracket to mount the speaker it's way to big. We had to make an extra part to be able to attached to the boat.
customer_reviews.author: joe fachine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounded great in beginning but one started sounding scratchy after one day. NON RETURNABLE. I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Nice speaker.... But the ad gives you impression you get a pair.... You buy a "Pair" of speakers, not just one. Stereo, get it? So when the package arrives there's only one freakin speaker. So now I gotta order and wait and wait for another one. Aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: " Misleading"  It says speaker system
customer_reviews.text: Beware, It says "SPEAKER SYSTEM" there is only one speaker in the box. Tell me what speaker system would include just one 6x9 speaker. They are not priced in pairs, like you would expect all other 6x9 speakers to be. Who buys just one 6x9 speaker. I have never seen a 6x9 speaker system that only includes one speaker. Now, I can either pay to ship it back or buy another one. Go figure, probably exactally what they wanted.
customer_reviews.author: ALBERT J MCMILLIN II

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Two and both LEDs Don't work right... Boss Audio Support does not respond
customer_reviews.text: Contacted support after installing the speakers and noticing the defective LEDs, one I managed to get working the other does not respond to the remote at all. The lights briefly flicker once they get power but then nothing. Support checked and said they should get more in stock in August. Here we are in September with no replacement and no replies on my 3rd email. You call the number and they should have been open an hour ago and it says they are still closed and to call during normal business hours. Stay away from Boss Audio. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: JKLLOVE2005

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 powered by a nice marine clarion amp.sound quality is just OK. They can not handle even close to rated watt. Head unit and amp set with oscope RMS meter at 150. Frq at 100hz on cross over over powered and distortion. 180hz cleans it up nicely but does not handle frq range as stated. Backed down to 90 RMSceossover at 80hz for clean full sound. I thought boss junk then I read the reviews and decided to go for it. As I thought a waste.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Mounted a pair of these on a wake board tower on a boat. Build is solid with strong mounting structure. Sound quality was initially good but not exceptional. Of course none of this matters if the speakers blow. These speakers were used with high quality audio components and never abused with too much wattage. One speaker started cracking within the first two months. The other is still working fine. I would not recommend this product. The price is good but the quality is questionable. I'm currently replacing them with a higher quality speaker system.
customer_reviews.author: bardrontrusk

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: Excelent sound. The leds are incredible. I conect them to a 800w 2 chanels amplifier and works excelent!!
customer_reviews.author: ignacio f.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaay bigger than I thought they would be but one of the only set of speakers I found in a reasonable range to fit on our Monster Tower (2.5" bar) They sound great out on the lake, we bought a simple amp to run them and I am happy with these speakers. There are more expensive brands of course but for the money these are a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Riverachel

customer_reviews.title: They sound great but the screw that holds them to the mount ...
customer_reviews.text: They sound great but the screw that holds them to the mount keeps loosening itself despite Nylock nut. They are OK, but if I had the money to spend again I would buy a higher quality product. But they are an OK budget surf speaker.
customer_reviews.author: arue333

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Awsome, totally happy . Put them on my side by side .I can hear my music over the sound of my atv, even when riding trails with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Parochetti

customer_reviews.title: Took it offloading no issues and sound good.
customer_reviews.text: Put on my 2014 JKU roll bars. Took it offloading no issues and sound good.
customer_reviews.author: Frank De La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Make Driving fun again.
customer_reviews.text: Ear hemorrhaging with 50 watt stock amp in the polaris slingshot. Once the 2x 400 watt amps are wired up and both speakers are in, It will be bone crushing . Very sensitive speakers .Just what I was looking for. Make Driving fun again .
customer_reviews.author: KAOSKTRL

customer_reviews.title: These sound great!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sounds really good hooked up to the 1000 watt Pyle Amp I also bought on Amazon. We had a blast cranking up the tunes on the lake this last weekend.
customer_reviews.author: J Atwater

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for the money . I ren them with a Kenwood head and a 1000 watt Kenwood 5 channel amp .
customer_reviews.text: All and all they sound great for the money .
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ball

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers if you get good ones
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and sounded great for the first month. One of the midranges blew that is why I subtracted one star. I subtracted a second star because of the 1 year warranty on defective products means you have to pay to send it back and send them $20. I may as well just buy another speaker at that price. I am using the PLMRA200 amp.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R.

customer_reviews.title: Rockin Wrangler
customer_reviews.text: Great Product for the money. I put these on the roll bar of my Jeep Wrangler. they look cool and can handle quite a bit of power. they aren't the best on the market but they work for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mullins

customer_reviews.title: sounds good at first but they hold up for about 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 8 of these speakers and all 8 have blew. sounds good at first but they hold up for about 8 hours or so.
customer_reviews.author: john shaddon

customer_reviews.title: Worked on Jeep needs an Amp
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my Jeep CJ. Fit really nicely on the roll bar between the seats (I do not have a back seat). The mount is great for roll bars. You definitely need an amp for this guy. My only complaint is the wire connections. They are on top, exposed to elements, and there is no way to protect.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Allen

customer_reviews.title: Work well have good power. Mounted on back of semi truck has ...
customer_reviews.text: Work well have good power. Mounted on back of semi truck has good sound while loading flat bed.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through speakers lots of speakers before and these perform very well. The price was outstanding and the sound quality good. Not the top of the line speaker, but how good is the sound quality at the lake with a 350 horsepower engine roaring anyway? And the price couldn't be beat. The drawbacks are they do not have a quick detach feature for easy removal and they are a bit bulky.
customer_reviews.author: KAL In GilbertAZ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice speakers sure wish they would have some info on the led light setup.
customer_reviews.author: Ptoews

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are ok not great not horrible. My last pair liquid audio were much better
customer_reviews.author: Tim R.

customer_reviews.title: Sound Great
customer_reviews.text: For the price these sound really good! I am running a 1000 watt amp that helps to drive them and they keep the boat rocking..
customer_reviews.author: John Winchester

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good speaker for the $$. Not high end but decent for cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Neal B. Peifer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I put these on the roll bar of my Jeep and I can hear them clear as day even on the freeway. The jeep has no doors so there is a lot of road and wind noise.
customer_reviews.author: Seth A. Waldman

customer_reviews.title: was skeptical. what a surprise
customer_reviews.text: got these to run on my rzr, must say i am pleased. though they do need an amp they rock... mounting clamp could have been a bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: scott ham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: put them on my golf cart and they sound great
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: I ran an iPod through a small amp to these speakers and they sounded awesome. These speakers are also sturdy and durable; Mounted on my Polaris RZR and they seem ready any water/mud thrown at them; Depending on your set-up, you may need a second amp and subwoofer just to drive the bass a little deeper. Sounded great without the sub...just saying... Writing a review is harder than it seems...try it and help us all out.:) Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: mach63129

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are great. They sound great and look great! Fit on the tower perfectly. I recommend these highly. Make sure that you have a good amp.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really good speakers with out amp.. sound great and low price
customer_reviews.author: estebandelreal

customer_reviews.title: Great for boats not a sxs or utv
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound amazing and get VERY loud, but if your planning on putting them on a utv or sxs go with something else because they're huge and my roll cage tubing isn't big enough for the mounting brackets. But when I hooked an 800 watt amp to them they made me light headed they were so loud and didnt lose quality at high volume. Awesome speakers.
customer_reviews.author: rusty

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: So very pleasantly pleased with these speakers. No problem installing and they have great sound! Love the sound system even more now!
customer_reviews.author: shooker77

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for your buck, loud and didn't need an amp. If mounting to a roll bar for a truck make sure to add rubber or similar because the clamp is too big for most roll-cages.
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: installs easy
customer_reviews.text: installed on my wakeboard tower with the boss ar 1200 amp. its loud with a lot of highs and lows,plenty of sound for your boarder or party! price is the most reasonable i could find
customer_reviews.author: sweedish

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 to put on my 20 ft Proline ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 to put on my 20 ft Proline center console. After I spent the entire day taking off the T-top, installing the speakers i realized one was blown. I return the speaker and was sent a damaged one with 2 shades of white. I should have known I get what I pay for.
customer_reviews.author: keith bailey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use them on a parade float and they are still working.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gulden

customer_reviews.title: Kicks Ass
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these speakers, mounted them to the roll bars of my Polaris Ranger pointed to the rear. I installed a Pyle 400 Watt Amp to drive them. Outstanding sound. I used them the first time this past weekend at a bike rally, pulled a trailer with a stripper pole behind my Ranger. The Audio system was Kickin....and was a hit of the rally. Was envied by all, especially those that spent huge amounts on their audio system, and they never came close to mine. Love the BOSS speakers, Pyle Amps, ......
customer_reviews.author: Stressed

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Return Policy (((Not nice)))
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and they will work (I am not happy with the product). However, try to return speakers to Amazon and they classify them as a "Hazard" due to magnetic device. What????? It was okay for them to ship them to me, but I cant ship them back if I am not satisfied? Wow! Then they send me to a process to sell them myself on Amazon.... WHAT? I can say that (((YOU AMAZON)))) just got a small amount of $$ and lost a customer due to this. I hope you do this to enough people and it shows in the Board-room for the stock holders. Maybe that will wake your organization up?
customer_reviews.author: HUGH KELLY

product_meta.title: BOSS Audio MRWT69 6"x9" 550W 4-Way Marine Wake Tower Speaker System (Black), Small/Medium
product_meta.description:
Style:6" x 9" Black Tower Speaker

View larger FULLY MARINIZED (WATER RESISTANT WITH UV PROTECTION)
This product is fully marinized but not waterproof. Since the MRWT69 lives near the water almost all the time, all of the major components such as the spider, surround, etc. have been specially coated to have the protection that they need from corrosion that is present in a humid and salty environment. The outside shell also has an ultraviolet coating to protect it from the damaging effects of the sun by maintaining material integrity and keeping them looking new.

CONE – POLY INJECTION
Polyurethane, categorized as a polymer, is a resilient, flexible, and durable manufactured material that can take the place of paint, cotton, rubber, metal, or wood in thousands of applications across virtually all fields. It can be hard like fiberglass, squishy like upholstery foam, protective like varnish, bouncy like rubber, or sticky like glue. In the specific case of our cones, this material allows for maximum flexibility that produces great sounding speakers lasting you a long, long time.

SURROUND – BUTYL RUBBER
Butyl Rubber is a synthetic (man made) substance and is valued for its chemical inertness, impermeability to air, and the ability to endure or resist exposure to many types of weather fronts. Butyl rubber has applications from sports equipment to automotive parts, the medical industry, and more. We use them for the surrounds that connect the cone to the basket. Did you know that most modern chewing gum uses food-grade butyl rubber as the central gum base, which contributes not only the gum's elasticity but an obstinate, sticky quality? Just like that chewing gum, the Butyl Rubber Surround in our speakers can take the equivalent amount of abuse without quitting on you.

VOICE COIL – HIGH TEMPERATURE ALUMINUM
One of the most abundant elements on earth, Aluminum is remarkable for its low density and for its ability to resist corrosion. It is nonmagnetic (does not have any magnetic properties) and does not easily ignite. This solid material has the ability to perform under stress in both high tension and high compression environments. Aluminum is relatively soft, making it one of the more ideal materials to use in voice coils.

MIDRANGE & TWEETER – MYLAR
For a modern edge, the best car speaker could be the high tech Mylar tweeter, as it generally has more ability for a wider variance of sound modifications and channel handling. Unlike paper cones, the Mylar has a higher rate of durability, as the cone is made of a plastic poly material, which does not rip or tear easily under abnormal frequency changes.

SPECIFICATIONS
 * 6 x 9 inch, four-way Marine Waketower speaker system
 * Midrange: 2-1/2 inch
 * Tweeter: two 1 inch
 * Peak power: 550 Watts
 * RMS power: 275
 * Impedance: 4 Ohms
 *  Frequency response: 40Hz – 20kHz
 * Sensitivity: 95 dB @ 1 W/1 Meter
 * Dimensions: 12.5” L x 11.6” W x 9.25 H
 * Is not sold in pairs



AMAZON.COM


Keep the party going on your boat deck with this single Boss Audio MRWT69 6 x 9-inch four-way speaker, optimized for waketower use. With 550 watts of peak power handling, it's ready for whatever you're dishing out, not to mention whatever the marine environment's dishing out.

Keep the party going on your boat deck. Click here for a larger image Designed for waketower use and ready for the rough marine environment. WAKETOWER READY
The MRWT69 is designed specifically for waketower use, easily installed by hanging from above. The speaker enclosures are optimized for the task, protected from potentially damaging wind and surf.

POWERFUL AUDIO
Featuring a 6 x 9 inch oblong design, the MRWT69's speaker offers an 80-ounce magnet structure, metallic injection cone material, 1.5-inch aluminum voice coil, and dual 1-inch mylar dome tweeters, for clear highs, low distortion, and maximum peak power handling.

Each MRWT69 can handle up to 550 watts of peak power, and they come with a durable black-and-silver metal cover.

FERROFLUID ENHANCED
As with many Boss designs, magnetic ferrofluid is utilized in this speaker's construction, between the magnet and voice coil, for added heat conductivity away from the voice coil itself. This allows the speaker to take much more power without damaging the voice coil.

ONE-YEAR WARRANTY
Get some added piece of mind with Boss' one-year warranty.

MRWT69 SELECT SPECIFICATIONS
